divs: Sighting DetailsApproximately 1930 as we were headed west on Hwy 6 into Hico, my wife and I saw two groups of yellow lights in the NW approximately 40 degrees above the horizon. there were several lights in each group in a oval or circle. For less than a minute the trees obscured our view but it seemed that they were randomly flashing. After clearing the trees the lights were gone but we noticed the lights of 2 high flying aircraft headed toward Ft Worth.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Hico
There were no other sightings in Hico on or around December 15th 2009
